affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/team/orders/execute.mp3" );
	wait ( 1000.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/weapons/m4/m4fire01.wav" );
	set ( "SET_FAKEGUN", "sergeant" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", -1 );
}
